A few years ago I read an article in the

(April 2010). It was about some children my age learning to play the piano so they could play during their Primary sacrament meeting program. I said to myself, “I can do that!” I started playing prelude music for Primary, and by the end of the year, I was able to play a song during the Primary program! I really love using my talent to serve the Lord.
Graham W., Devin D., and Gavin M., all age 4, Georgia, USA
